description: This file defines the CategoryRowsAdapter class for an Android app, which manages a RecyclerView containing horizontal lists of videos categorized by strings. It handles view creation, data binding, and focus navigation within nested RecyclerViews.

classes.name: CategoryRowsAdapter
classes.description: An adapter for a RecyclerView that displays categories with horizontally scrolling lists of videos. It manages nested adapters and focus navigation.

classes.name: CategoryRowsAdapter.RowVH
classes.description: ViewHolder for each category row, containing the category title and nested RecyclerView for videos.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates a new ViewHolder instance for a category row.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds category data to the ViewHolder and sets up nested RecyclerView with videos.

methods.name: requestFocusFor
methods.description: Requests focus on a specific video within a nested RecyclerView in a particular position.
